title: Retail
content:
I help early-stage and growing companies build/scale a solid technical foundation without the need for a full-time hire.

From releasing your MVP to setting up scalable and robust infrastructure, I ensure your platform and team are ready to grow. As your needs evolve, I'm here to provide dedicated support and collaboration.

title: Digital Agencies
content:
I partner with digital agencies to streamline their technical delivery.

From building reusable platforms to improving deployment pipelines and ensuring robust incident management, I help you deliver high-quality solutions to your clientsâ€”meeting deadlines and budget requirements.

title: Enterprises
content:
I help established companies modernize their legacy systems and adopt cloud-native practices.

From architecture reviews to DevOps transformation, I ensure your systems are not only scalable and secure but also optimized to drive your key business objectives.
